```{r}
library(eurostat)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
searchData <- 
  eurostat::search_eurostat("satisfaction")
searchData
```
```{r}
data <- 
  eurostat::get_eurostat("ilc_pw01",
    type = "label", time_format = "num"
  )

data %>% 
  filter(
    age == "From 16 to 19 years",
    sex != "Total",
    geo %in% c("Euro area â€“ 20 countries (from 2023)", "Poland"),
    isced11 == "All ISCED 2011 levels",
    indic_wb == "Overall life satisfaction"
  ) %>%
  select(sex, "year" = TIME_PERIOD, "value" = values, geo) %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = year,
      y = value,
      color = geo
    )
  ) + 
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~sex)

data$geo %>% unique
```
